triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the foundation technology that the paper builds upon for RTL generation

triples.name: ChatGPT
triples.relevance: ChatGPT is explicitly mentioned as a recent successful LLM that inspired this research

triples.name: GPT-3
triples.relevance: GPT-3.5 is used and evaluated in the proposed benchmark for RTL generation

triples.name: Register-transfer level
triples.relevance: RTL is the design representation language that the paper focuses on generating

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the underlying field enabling natural-language-to-code translation

triples.name: Code generation
triples.relevance: Code generation from natural language is the core task addressed by the paper

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: Prompt engineering is used as a technique to improve LLM performance on RTL generation

triples.name: Hardware description language
triples.relevance: HDLs like Verilog are the target languages for RTL generation

triples.name: Benchmark (computing)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes RTLLM, a new open-source benchmark for evaluating LLM-based RTL generation
